title: Collegiate Esports Program Case Studies
body:
## Using Data to Drive Esports Program Decision-Making

A case study about using student data to inform the process of developing a college esports program. We cover the school's crucial demographic information, their strategic goals in launching an esports program, and how data collection leads naturally into next-steps.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1BYbC5fzPLo" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

## Using a Collegiate Esports Program to Support Enrollment Goals

This case study covers using a collegiate esports program to support the strategic enrollment goals of an institution. In this video, I cover how esports can both help connect your school to pools of new students and be a tool for initiating partnerships with local educational organizations.   

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KkOvCOpvpRM" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

## Gathering Partners to Build Program Momentum & Sustainability Around Your Collegiate Esports Program

This video presents a case study about gathering partners and support to help build sustainability and momentum around your collegiate esports program. I cover how we worked with a school to define their value proposition, find local and national sponsors, and secure discounts for equipment necessary to their esports program rollout.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VUZnoBki0gg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
